original_text: Jesus said to them, ‘My Father has sent me. I must do the things he wants me to do. I must finish the work that he has given to me to do. That is my food.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 나의 양식은 나를 보내신 이의 뜻을 행하며 그의 일을 온전히 이루는 이것이니라

sentences.original_text: I must do the things he wants me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그가 원하시는 것들을 해야 한다

sentences.original_text: that he has given to me to do
